title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 101.1 - General information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 101.1 - General information

State Regulations
A foreign banking corporation seeking a license under

Banking Law, article V, to establish an initial branch or agency in New York

State shall submit to the superintendent an application on form FB-101
containing the information and documents required by section
101.3
of this Supervisory

Procedure, accompanied by payment of the fee specified in section
1.2
of Supervisory Policy G 1 of
this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
101.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
